data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Leeds needs to be cautious. Crystal Palace have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 2, Crystal Palace have a dangerous throw-in.
Crystal Palace pushes forward through Andros Townsend, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Leeds in the half of Crystal Palace.
In the minute 3, Crystal Palace awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Leeds in their own half.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Leeds in their own half.
In the minute 4, Free kick for Crystal Palace in their own half.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park.
Throw-in Crystal Palace.
In the minute 6, Goal kick for Leeds at Selhurst Park.
Patrick Van Aanholt gets his shot on target but fails to score for Crystal Palace.
Leeds have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
In the minute 8, Liam Cooper's header is off-target for Leeds.
Chris Kavanagh awards Crystal Palace a goal kick.
Can Leeds get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crystal Palace's half?
In the minute 11, Free kick for Crystal Palace in their own half.
Corner awarded to Crystal Palace.
Goal! Crystal Palace have taken a 1-0 lead courtesy of a header from Scott Dann.
In the minute 12, That's a fine assist from Eberechi Eze.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Crystal Palace in their own half.
Chris Kavanagh awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 18, Chris Kavanagh blows against Leeds's Patrick Bamford for offside.
Leeds awarded a free kick in their own half.
Crystal Palace are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 21, Play has been interrupted briefly in London to check on Mateusz Klich, who is grimacing with pain.
Leeds's Mateusz Klich looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Crystal Palace take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Eberechi Eze.
In the minute 24, Crystal Palace awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Chris Kavanagh signals a Leeds throw-in in Crystal Palace's half.
Leeds to take a throw-in in Crystal Palace territory.
In the minute 25, Ball safe as Crystal Palace is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Crystal Palace awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 27, Patrick Bamford puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 2-1.
Stuart Dallas instrumental with a fine assist.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 30, Chris Kavanagh signals a Leeds throw-in in Crystal Palace's half.
Crystal Palace push forward at Selhurst Park and Wilfried Zaha gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Leeds defence.
Crystal Palace have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
In the minute 32, Leeds have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Free kick Leeds.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Leeds in their own half.
Corner awarded to Leeds.
Chris Kavanagh awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 39, Leeds to take a throw-in in Crystal Palace territory.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park.
Can Crystal Palace get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leeds's half?
In the minute 40, Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Crystal Palace in their own half.
Ball safe as Crystal Palace is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Leeds.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Crystal Palace in their own half.
Helder Costa has the misfortune to make it 3-1 through an own goal.
Throw-in for Leeds in the half of Crystal Palace.
In the minute 45, Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Leeds just outside Crystal Palace's area.
At Selhurst Park the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Marcelo Bielsa (Leeds) is making a first substitution, with Raphinha replacing Helder Costa.
Chris Kavanagh signals a Crystal Palace throw-in in Leeds's half.
In the minute 47, Leeds awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Leeds in London.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Crystal Palace in their own half.
At Selhurst Park, Liam Cooper has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Corner awarded to Leeds.
Leeds have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
In the minute 51, Pascal Struijk for Leeds gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Crystal Palace goal kick.
Crystal Palace's Eberechi Eze breaks free at Selhurst Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 52, Ball goes out of play for a Leeds goal kick.
Crystal Palace awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Leeds.
In the minute 55, Leeds to take a throw-in in Crystal Palace territory.
In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Crystal Palace in the half of Leeds.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Leeds in their own half.
Throw-in for Leeds close to the penalty box.
In the minute 61, Crystal Palace awarded a free kick in their own half.
Crystal Palace are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Throw-in Crystal Palace.
In the minute 62, Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Leeds in their own half.
Goal kick for Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park.
Free kick for Crystal Palace in the half of Leeds.
In the minute 64, Free kick in a good position for Crystal Palace!
Eberechi Eze (Crystal Palace) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Leeds's Ezgjan Alioski gets in a shot on goal at Selhurst Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 65, Leeds have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
Jack Harrison of Leeds smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Crystal Palace's Wilfried Zaha is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 67, Luke Ayling (Leeds) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Crystal Palace have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
Great finish from Jordan Ayew to give Crystal Palace a 4-1 lead.
In the minute 70, Wilfried Zaha with an assist there.
Roy Hodgson is making the team's first substitution at Selhurst Park with Jeffrey Schlupp replacing Andros Townsend.
Tyler Roberts is replacing Pascal Struijk for Leeds at Selhurst Park.
In the minute 74, In London, Patrick Bamford (Leeds) misses the target with a header.
Chris Kavanagh awards Crystal Palace a goal kick.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Crystal Palace.
In the minute 75, It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
Free kick for Leeds in the half of Crystal Palace.
In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 77, Mateusz Klich for Leeds has been booked by Chris Kavanagh and receives a first yellow card.
James McCarthy is replacing Jairo Riedewald for the home team.
Crystal Palace have a goal kick.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Leeds in their own half.
Leeds's Jack Harrison gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Crystal Palace goal kick.
In the minute 82, In London Crystal Palace drive forward through Patrick Van Aanholt. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Can Leeds capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Crystal Palace's half?
Can Leeds capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 84, Raphinha of Leeds gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park.
Crystal Palace make their third substitution with Christian Benteke replacing Jordan Ayew.
In the minute 86, Ball safe as Leeds is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Crystal Palace.
In the minute 88, Crystal Palace are pushing forward but Patrick Van Aanholt's finish is wide of the goal.
Leeds have a goal kick.
Chris Kavanagh awards Crystal Palace a goal kick.
Can Leeds get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crystal Palace's half?
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Chris Kavanagh signals a throw-in for Leeds, close to Crystal Palace's area.
Crystal Palace awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
The second-half is over. The match ends 4-1.
